info.title: Project 2 API - 8th generation videogames
info.description: This is an API that allows you to pull some information of games from the Nintentdo Switch, Playstation 4 and Xbox One consoles

get.description: This GET route allows you to pull up all the switch games there are in the database

200.description: You get a JSON object with all the information from the collection

500.description: You get an error object, check the URL or contact support

200.description: You get a JSON object with all the information from that specific game Id

500.description: You get an error object, check the _id you used or contact support

204.description: You get a confirmation of the addition

500.description: You get an error object, check the validation rules or contact support

204.description: You get a confirmation of the update

500.description: You get an error object, check the validation rules or contact support

204.description: You get a confirmation of the deletion

500.description: You get an error object, check the _id and validation rules or contact support
